/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Bare trees stand tall against the backdrop of a gray sky, their branches reaching out as if yearning for the sun. Power lines crisscross above, forming a web-like pattern that adds a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The street itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
